artist: Painter: After Peter Paul Rubens; Engraver: Robert Brichet
description: Holy Family with St. Elizabeth and John the Baptist; Virgin seated on bench at center with Christ Child in her lap; John the Baptist at right with lamb following him; St. Joseph at right and St. Elizabeth at left; pillaster behind them in a landscape
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription 

in black on sheet: 86 / Rubens Pinx   Brichet sc. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | on sheet LLC in pencil: 1-330
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 86
title: Print
